songs.title: Back to You
songs.lyrics:
Went to the doctor and I got myself checked
He looked me in my eye
And said I’m suffering from success
And  I owe it all to you Saint Lou
Where you at?
I been stacking  down the road less traveled
I’m a vic?
Like a trials
Coulda had a nigga
Shook like  etch a sketch
But them trials made a nigga what he is
Strong as ever
I can’t promise I won’t leave
But I promise I’ll come back
From Cali To  Carolina
And I’ll always circle back
Where I did my first dirt
Where I felt my first hurt
Where I birthed my first child
Where I smoked  my first pert(?)
Every time I see that rush
When I first come back from out of town
Drop my bags
Kiss my kids
Man you know they keep me grounded
Money make me straight
But the love make me stay
CAtch me rolling through the norht
Roaches in the ash tray
Let a nigga put you down
He’ll have to answer to me
I swore to the daath of me
I’ll rep you to my last day
Saint Louis  I’m talking to you

Refrain:
I’ll always come back to you
I’ll always come back to you
I’ll always come back to you
I’ll always come back to you
I’ll always come back to you


Every time I leave my city
Always hope to come back
Since I was young the homies told me
Home is where the heart’s at
Since I took my first steps
This is where I started at
Crazy like the 80’s with them jackets
And them starter  hats
? showers
Light rain
Block parties
Nice games
Thugs chilling
Drug Dealing
Shorty with them tight frames
Says to me
Night train
On her way to school
High as fuck
Turnt up
Only went to actt a fool
On punishment for suspension
Friend from creatures?
Discouraged to malnourished
There’s ain’t nothing they can teach us
They feed us with Jesus
The stories they make me get astounded
I can’t get them Adidas
With my momma on the county
With four mouths to feed
We got four blocks of cheese
Some beans and lettuce and bread
It was all we got for free
But despite the hardships
And how the government dissed us
Every time I leave I always miss you
I always miss you


Refrain:
I’ll always come back to you
I’ll always come back to you
I’ll always come back to you
I’ll always come back to you
I’ll always come back to you


Right?
Right?
Right?
Right?
1986 Riverside California
I was born at Logan ?
That’s where I came out my momma
Went to Highland
I got kicked out
I would have?
I left my lyric(?) suit
My birth right
On a flat top
Yeah I
I got kicked out
Central?
Same thing ain’t changed
I ain’t having it
Little ?
Call my momma like this
Like how?
BAd
The day that I turned 14
I moved to ACL
And when I saw my first pound
Man I thought  subsist
Selling dimes selling nicks
I was trying to get rich
Now a days you might see me out
With suits

Mingling with the stars

Rolling up a hoe
? by myself
Couldn’t care about myself
Came up in this ?
My niggas that’s left
4 to the 3
Made a promise to the three
I can’t leave but if I do


I’ll always come back to you
I’ll always come back to you
I’ll always come back to you
I’ll always come back to you
I’ll always come back to you
